desc.en: 貝裡塔斯在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中準備了自爆程式。但生命守護者早已被敵人駭入了。奇普託斯的天空再次染紅且陷入絕望當中，白子和老師抵達了駭入生命守護者的位置，在那邊遇見了誘騙者和另一個白子。
desc.jp: 貝裡塔斯在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中準備了自爆程式。但生命守護者早已被敵人駭入了。奇普託斯的天空再次染紅且陷入絕望當中，白子和老師抵達了駭入生命守護者的位置，在那邊遇見了誘騙者和另一個白子。
desc.zh_cn: {cn贝里塔斯}在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中准备了自爆程序。但生命守护者早已被敌人骇入了。奇普托斯的天空再次染红且陷入绝望当中，{cf白子}和老师抵达了骇入生命守护者的位置，在那边遇见了诱骗者和另一个{cf白子}。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.en: 船上，優香向陽葵詢問情況，陽葵則表示他們中了敵人的計：在他們佔領方舟時，敵人也在反向駭入生命守護者艦艇並已成功。優香表示這必須透過物理手段達到，但並沒有人來過這——除了一個人。
desc.jp: 船上，優香向陽葵詢問情況，陽葵則表示他們中了敵人的計：在他們佔領方舟時，敵人也在反向駭入生命守護者艦艇並已成功。優香表示這必須透過物理手段達到，但並沒有人來過這——除了一個人。
desc.zh_cn: 船上，{cf优香}向{cf阳葵}询问情况，{cf阳葵}则表示他们中了敌人的计：在他们占领方舟时，敌人也在反向骇入生命守护者舰艇并已成功。{cf优香}表示这必须通过物理手段达到，但并没有人来过这——除了一个人。

desc.jp: 兩人記起那一位白子同學來，認定大概就是在那個時候。
desc.zh_cn: 两人记起那一位{cf白子}同学来，认定大概就是在那个时候。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 陽葵同時表示，現在他們不僅喪失對戰艦的控制，戰艦甚至還在協助方舟進行多次元詮釋。她警告說，這樣聖塔很有可能再度出現。
desc.jp: 陽葵同時表示，現在他們不僅喪失對戰艦的控制，戰艦甚至還在協助方舟進行多次元詮釋。她警告說，這樣聖塔很有可能再度出現。
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}同时表示，现在他们不仅丧失对战舰的控制，战舰甚至还在协助方舟进行多次元诠释。她警告说，这样圣塔很有可能再度出现。

desc.en: 白子遇見了誘騙者，她大喊他就是將她綁架的人。白子讓誘騙者不要輕舉妄動，畢竟夏萊的老師可是也在場上。誘騙者沒做什麼，說出了啟動箱子的密碼。白子立刻開槍。

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: 一片煙中，白子發現子彈全部沒有命中，令她大為震驚。這時，老師聽見了自己和疑似彩奈的名字――是對方的，箱子。
desc.jp: 一片煙中，白子發現子彈全部沒有命中，令她大為震驚。這時，老師聽見了自己和疑似彩奈的名字――是對方的，箱子。
desc.zh_cn: 一片烟中，{cf白子}发现子弹全部没有命中，令她大为震惊。这时，老师听见了自己和疑似{cf彩奈}的名字――是对方的，箱子。

desc.en: A.R.O.N.A.宣佈方舟的修復程式啟動，並且被入侵的生命守護者也將在800秒後啟動最終自爆程式。另一位白子向老師冷冰冰地宣告基沃託斯迎向終結的不可避性，並對著誘騙者稱呼老師的名字。
desc.jp: A.R.O.N.A.宣佈方舟的修復程式啟動，並且被入侵的生命守護者也將在800秒後啟動最終自爆程式。另一位白子向老師冷冰冰地宣告基沃託斯迎向終結的不可避性，並對著誘騙者稱呼老師的名字。
desc.zh_cn: A.R.O.N.A.宣布方舟的修复程序启动，并且被入侵的生命守护者也将在800秒后启动最终自爆程序。另一位{cf白子}向老师冷冰冰地宣告基沃托斯迎向终结的不可避性，并对着诱骗者称呼老师的名字。

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 優香和陽葵驚訝的發現，生命守衛者艦艇被方舟駭入，並且前者實際上正在協助後者的運算，重新執行“多次元詮釋”，同時利用船艦的能量修復次元引擎。陽葵警告說，聖所隨時可能出現。
desc.jp: 優香和陽葵驚訝的發現，生命守衛者艦艇被方舟駭入，並且前者實際上正在協助後者的運算，重新執行“多次元詮釋”，同時利用船艦的能量修復次元引擎。陽葵警告說，聖所隨時可能出現。
desc.zh_cn: {cf优香}和{cf阳葵}惊讶的发现，生命守卫者舰艇被方舟骇入，并且前者实际上正在协助后者的运算，重新执行“多次元诠释”，同时利用船舰的能量修复次元引擎。{cf阳葵}警告说，圣所随时可能出现。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

name.en: 白子與另一時間線上的自己
name.jp: 白子與另一時間線上的自己

desc.en: 白子見到了誘騙者與另一時間線上的自己，而A.R.O.N.A.肯定了白子的描述。老師感到驚奇，詢問A.R.O.N.A.是否就是彩奈，而前者給出了“部分肯定”。
desc.jp: 白子見到了誘騙者與另一時間線上的自己，而A.R.O.N.A.肯定了白子的描述。老師感到驚奇，詢問A.R.O.N.A.是否就是彩奈，而前者給出了“部分肯定”。
desc.zh_cn: {cf白子}见到了诱骗者与另一时间线上的自己，而A.R.O.N.A.肯定了{cf白子}的描述。老师感到惊奇，询问A.R.O.N.A.是否就是{cf彩奈}，而前者给出了“部分肯定”。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: 彩奈對A.R.O.N.A.居然能脫離系統、存在實體形態感到驚訝，而後者則表示這主要是由於環境的混沌不確定性導致，且表示由於其特殊身份能直接與彩奈通訊。
desc.jp: 彩奈對A.R.O.N.A.居然能脫離系統、存在實體形態感到驚訝，而後者則表示這主要是由於環境的混沌不確定性導致，且表示由於其特殊身份能直接與彩奈通訊。
desc.zh_cn: {cf彩奈}对A.R.O.N.A.居然能脱离系统、存在实体形态感到惊讶，而后者则表示这主要是由于环境的混沌不确定性导致，且表示由于其特殊身份能直接与{cf彩奈}通信。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

name.en: 老師與另一時間線上的老師
name.jp: 老師與另一時間線上的老師
name.zh_cn: 老师与另一时间线上的老师

desc.en: A.R.O.N.A.要求老師——誘騙者——下達命令。老師這才意識到誘騙者實際上就是另一時間線的自己；A.R.O.N.A.雖確認了這一說法，但表示兩者有一明顯區別。
desc.jp: A.R.O.N.A.要求老師——誘騙者——下達命令。老師這才意識到誘騙者實際上就是另一時間線的自己；A.R.O.N.A.雖確認了這一說法，但表示兩者有一明顯區別。
desc.zh_cn: A.R.O.N.A.要求老师——诱骗者——下达命令。老师这才意识到诱骗者实际上就是另一时间线的自己；A.R.O.N.A.虽确认了这一说法，但表示两者有一明显区别。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: 彩奈隨後解釋，誘騙者形態的老師，已經死亡。
desc.jp: 彩奈隨後解釋，誘騙者形態的老師，已經死亡。
desc.zh_cn: {cf彩奈}随后解释，诱骗者形态的老师，已经死亡。

desc.en: 另一時間線上的白子表示肯定，並表示原因就是因為她殺死了老師，之後老師成為了“色彩的嚮導者”，成了現在這個樣子。她表示老師將她引導到了這裡，讓她毀滅世界。
desc.jp: 另一時間線上的白子表示肯定，並表示原因就是因為她殺死了老師，之後老師成為了“色彩的嚮導者”，成了現在這個樣子。她表示老師將她引導到了這裡，讓她毀滅世界。
desc.zh_cn: 另一时间线上的{cf白子}表示肯定，并表示原因就是因为她杀死了老师，之后老师成为了“色彩的向导者”，成了现在这个样子。她表示老师将她引导到了这里，让她毁灭世界。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: 白子對自己“殺死”了老師和要“毀滅”世界兩件事感到不可接受，開始對另一個自己發起攻擊。但另一位在混戰中奪下了現在白子的槍，並指出命運的終宿必然讓她這麼去做——因為砂狼白子就是死神的代表。
desc.jp: 白子對自己“殺死”了老師和要“毀滅”世界兩件事感到不可接受，開始對另一個自己發起攻擊。但另一位在混戰中奪下了現在白子的槍，並指出命運的終宿必然讓她這麼去做——因為砂狼白子就是死神的代表。
desc.zh_cn: {cf白子}对自己“杀死”了老师和要“毁灭”世界两件事感到不可接受，开始对另一个自己发起攻击。但另一位在混战中夺下了现在{cf白子}的枪，并指出命运的终宿必然让她这么去做——因为砂狼{cf白子}就是死神的代表。

desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 另一時間線上的白子表示，由於時間線和所經歷的事件不同，現在的白子於她而言不是對手。並且指出為了保證能執行計劃、穩定地在當前世界活動，她必須要除掉當前時間線的白子，也就是為何要將她綁架於此。之後她對白子表示憐憫，表示如果白子按她所說的做，在其它人就此消失時就不會有任何痛苦。
desc.jp: 另一時間線上的白子表示，由於時間線和所經歷的事件不同，現在的白子於她而言不是對手。並且指出為了保證能執行計劃、穩定地在當前世界活動，她必須要除掉當前時間線的白子，也就是為何要將她綁架於此。之後她對白子表示憐憫，表示如果白子按她所說的做，在其它人就此消失時就不會有任何痛苦。
desc.zh_cn: 另一时间线上的{cf白子}表示，由于时间线和所经历的事件不同，现在的{cf白子}于她而言不是对手。并且指出为了保证能执行计划、稳定地在当前世界活动，她必须要除掉当前时间线的{cf白子}，也就是为何要将她绑架于此。之后她对{cf白子}表示怜悯，表示如果{cf白子}按她所说的做，在其它人就此消失时就不会有任何痛苦。

desc.en: 隱藏在地上的聖所出現了，邁向破滅的倒數速度也加快了。季在搜尋過程中發現了聖所，單槍匹馬去進行攻略。美食研究會與風華甩掉了窮追不捨的敵人，往阿特拉哈西斯的方舟的最下層移動。
desc.jp: 隱藏在地上的聖所出現了，邁向破滅的倒數速度也加快了。季在搜尋過程中發現了聖所，單槍匹馬去進行攻略。美食研究會與風華甩掉了窮追不捨的敵人，往阿特拉哈西斯的方舟的最下層移動。
desc.zh_cn: 隐藏在地上的圣所出现了，迈向破灭的倒数速度也加快了。{cf季}在搜索过程中发现了圣所，单枪匹马去进行攻略。{cn美食研究会}与{cf风华}甩掉了穷追不舍的敌人，往阿特拉哈西斯的方舟的最下层移动。

desc.en: 白子不願放棄。老師指出就像以前一樣，他一定是會來阻止白子的——另一位白子一樣同意。
desc.jp: 白子不願放棄。老師指出就像以前一樣，他一定是會來阻止白子的——另一位白子一樣同意。
desc.zh_cn: {cf白子}不愿放弃。老师指出就像以前一样，他一定是会来阻止{cf白子}的——另一位{cf白子}一样同意。

desc.en: 這時A.R.O.N.A.突然說明，聖所顯現程式（incarnation）已將聖所從凍結狀態中解除，由此加速多次元演繹的計算速度。

desc.zh_cn: 这时A.R.O.N.A.突然说明，圣所显现程序（incarnation）已将圣所从冻结状态中解除，由此加速多次元演绎的计算速度。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: 季與方舟上的陽葵聯絡，試圖表明自己所在的地區出現了聖所，但連線立刻中斷，同時還出現了大量敵人。在撤退與應戰之間，季認為自己所處的地區非常關鍵，因而決定應戰，幫助方舟上的老師。
desc.jp: 季與方舟上的陽葵聯絡，試圖表明自己所在的地區出現了聖所，但連線立刻中斷，同時還出現了大量敵人。在撤退與應戰之間，季認為自己所處的地區非常關鍵，因而決定應戰，幫助方舟上的老師。

desc.en: 方舟的自爆程式再次開始了。大家在準備逃脫的過程中，學生們為了協助老師而聚集在一起。為了讓世界走向滅亡，另一個白子與老師展開了決戰。
desc.jp: 方舟的自爆程式再次開始了。大家在準備逃脫的過程中，學生們為了協助老師而聚集在一起。為了讓世界走向滅亡，另一個白子與老師展開了決戰。
desc.zh_cn: 方舟的自爆程序再次开始了。大家在准备逃脱的过程中，学生们为了协助老师而聚集在一起。为了让世界走向灭亡，另一个{cf白子}与老师展开了决战。

desc.en: A.R.O.N.A.依據程式開始嘗試備用連線，但連線請求均被拒絕；隨後她試圖用聖所加速計算，但聖所已被破壞。A.R.O.N.A.不得不宣佈計劃將有可能失敗。
desc.jp: A.R.O.N.A.依據程式開始嘗試備用連線，但連線請求均被拒絕；隨後她試圖用聖所加速計算，但聖所已被破壞。A.R.O.N.A.不得不宣佈計劃將有可能失敗。
desc.zh_cn: A.R.O.N.A.依据程序开始尝试备用连接，但连接请求均被拒绝；随后她试图用圣所加速计算，但圣所已被破坏。A.R.O.N.A.不得不宣布计划将有可能失败。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: 方舟內部響起警報，A.R.O.N.A.宣佈方舟的自爆程式已啟動，並指出爆炸後多次元詮釋功能將永久消失。A.R.O.N.A.試圖重啟聖所顯現程式，但因資源不足無法啟動，操作被迫取消。
desc.jp: 方舟內部響起警報，A.R.O.N.A.宣佈方舟的自爆程式已啟動，並指出爆炸後多次元詮釋功能將永久消失。A.R.O.N.A.試圖重啟聖所顯現程式，但因資源不足無法啟動，操作被迫取消。
desc.zh_cn: 方舟内部响起警报，A.R.O.N.A.宣布方舟的自爆程序已启动，并指出爆炸后多次元诠释功能将永久消失。A.R.O.N.A.试图重启圣所显现程序，但因资源不足无法启动，操作被迫取消。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.

desc.en: 優香想讓遊戲開發部回到艦橋，準備使用莉音會長的逃脫程式。但四人拒絕執行優香的命令，並前往中央區幫助老師。優香先是一驚，但隨後表示同意。
desc.jp: 優香想讓遊戲開發部回到艦橋，準備使用莉音會長的逃脫程式。但四人拒絕執行優香的命令，並前往中央區幫助老師。優香先是一驚，但隨後表示同意。
desc.zh_cn: {cf优香}想让{cn游戏开发部}回到舰桥，准备使用{cf莉音}会长的逃脱程序。但四人拒绝执行{cf优香}的命令，并前往中央区帮助老师。{cf优香}先是一惊，但随后表示同意。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: A.R.O.N.A.警告自爆程式一旦啟動，方舟內部的人的生存概率將無限接近於零。另一位白子這時才意識到老師一直都是在拖延時間，等待大家到來。A.R.O.N.A.試圖透過其他途徑解決生命守護者的威脅，但被另一位白子叫住：她意識到老師不論如何都會克服困難、創造奇蹟，因而最佳方案應是先除掉老師。
desc.jp: A.R.O.N.A.警告自爆程式一旦啟動，方舟內部的人的生存概率將無限接近於零。另一位白子這時才意識到老師一直都是在拖延時間，等待大家到來。A.R.O.N.A.試圖透過其他途徑解決生命守護者的威脅，但被另一位白子叫住：她意識到老師不論如何都會克服困難、創造奇蹟，因而最佳方案應是先除掉老師。
desc.zh_cn: A.R.O.N.A.警告自爆程序一旦启动，方舟内部的人的生存概率将无限接近于零。另一位{cf白子}这时才意识到老师一直都是在拖延时间，等待大家到来。A.R.O.N.A.试图通过{sn其他}途径解决生命守护者的威胁，但被另一位{cf白子}叫住：她意识到老师不论如何都会克服困难、创造奇迹，因而最佳方案应是先除掉老师。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: 另一位白子的話轉變了誘騙者的思路，他命令A.R.O.N.A.轉換為戰鬥支援模式。老師不甘落後，叫出了彩奈進行協助。另一位白子警告老師自己的能力與這一時間線上的大家都很不同，老師則拿出了大人的卡片。
desc.jp: 另一位白子的話轉變了誘騙者的思路，他命令A.R.O.N.A.轉換為戰鬥支援模式。老師不甘落後，叫出了彩奈進行協助。另一位白子警告老師自己的能力與這一時間線上的大家都很不同，老師則拿出了大人的卡片。
desc.zh_cn: 另一位{cf白子}的话转变了诱骗者的思路，他命令A.R.O.N.A.转换为战斗支援模式。老师不甘落后，叫出了{cf彩奈}进行协助。另一位{cf白子}警告老师自己的能力与这一时间线上的大家都很不同，老师则拿出了大人的卡片。

desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: 另一位白子表示清楚老師的能力，但同時提醒老師：他面前的誘騙者，也是他自己，也是一位老師。彩奈指出誘騙者似乎掏出了一樣東西：一個已經嚴重碳化、但尚且完整的銀行卡。決戰一觸即發。【注意：本劇情過後即跳轉到活動劇情】
desc.jp: 另一位白子表示清楚老師的能力，但同時提醒老師：他面前的誘騙者，也是他自己，也是一位老師。彩奈指出誘騙者似乎掏出了一樣東西：一個已經嚴重碳化、但尚且完整的銀行卡。決戰一觸即發。【注意：本劇情過後即跳轉到活動劇情】
desc.zh_cn: 另一位{cf白子}表示清楚老师的能力，但同时提醒老师：他面前的诱骗者，也是他自己，也是一位老师。{cf彩奈}指出诱骗者似乎掏出了一样东西：一个已经严重碳化、但尚且完整的银行卡。决战一触即发。【注意：本剧情过后即跳转到活动剧情】

desc.en: 老師到達外圍第2區域的次元引擎前方。就如桃香所預想的那般，另一位白子果不其然又出現了。對策委員會一行人表示將立刻趕到，請求老師拖延時間。另一位白子進入戰鬥狀態。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.

desc.en: It's time for the final battle against Phrenapates. To defeat the enemy and escape the Ark, everyone must join forces. And the truth that will be revealed at the end of it all is...
desc.jp: It's time for the final battle against Phrenapates. To defeat the enemy and escape the Ark, everyone must join forces. And the truth that will be revealed at the end of it all is...
desc.zh_cn: 结束「阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战」后，老师顺利与{cf白子}会合。接着只剩下回到地面了──然而并非如此。在老师的面前，展现不同姿态的{cf白子}与色彩的向导者出现了。究竟，他们能否平安回到地上呢？

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.

desc.en: 畫面回到方舟，A.R.O.N.A.也表示，將啟動戰術支援支援誘騙者。
desc.jp: 畫面回到方舟，A.R.O.N.A.也表示，將啟動戰術支援支援誘騙者。
desc.zh_cn: 画面回到方舟，A.R.O.N.A.也表示，将启动战术支援支持诱骗者。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

name.en: 與另一時間線上的白子的戰鬥
name.jp: 與另一時間線上的白子的戰鬥
name.zh_cn: 与另一时间线上的{cf白子}的战斗

desc.en: 【此處為BOSS戰，該白子的血量總計為1,999,998，剩下的兩點實際為誘騙者的血量，將在後面一場戰鬥中出現；此戰鬥分為兩個階段。】
desc.jp: 【此處為BOSS戰，該白子的血量總計為1,999,998，剩下的兩點實際為誘騙者的血量，將在後面一場戰鬥中出現；此戰鬥分為兩個階段。】
desc.zh_cn: 【此处为BOSS战，该{cf白子}的血量总计为1,999,998，剩下的两点实际为诱骗者的血量，将在后面一场战斗中出现；此战斗分为两个阶段。】

desc.en: It's time for the final battle against Phrenapates. To defeat the enemy and escape the Ark, everyone must join forces. And the truth that will be revealed at the end of it all is...
desc.jp: It's time for the final battle against Phrenapates. To defeat the enemy and escape the Ark, everyone must join forces. And the truth that will be revealed at the end of it all is...
desc.zh_cn: 结束「阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战」后，老师顺利与{cf白子}会合。接着只剩下回到地面了──然而并非如此。在老师的面前，展现不同姿态的{cf白子}与色彩的向导者出现了。究竟，他们能否平安回到地上呢？

desc.en: It's time for the final battle against Phrenapates. To defeat the enemy and escape the Ark, everyone must join forces. And the truth that will be revealed at the end of it all is...
desc.jp: It's time for the final battle against Phrenapates. To defeat the enemy and escape the Ark, everyone must join forces. And the truth that will be revealed at the end of it all is...
desc.zh_cn: 结束「阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战」后，老师顺利与{cf白子}会合。接着只剩下回到地面了──然而并非如此。在老师的面前，展现不同姿态的{cf白子}与色彩的向导者出现了。究竟，他们能否平安回到地上呢？

desc.en: 如果不立刻啟動自爆程式，一切都會化為泡影。陽葵啟動了自爆程式。必須在方舟完全崩塌前擊倒誘騙者，然後逃出這個地方。
desc.jp: 如果不立刻啟動自爆程式，一切都會化為泡影。陽葵啟動了自爆程式。必須在方舟完全崩塌前擊倒誘騙者，然後逃出這個地方。
desc.zh_cn: 如果不立刻启动自爆程序，一切都会化为泡影。{cf阳葵}启动了自爆程序。必须在方舟完全崩塌前击倒诱骗者，然后逃出这个地方。

desc.en: 集中的能量造成了方舟各地區的緊急情況。優香斷定自爆程式必須啟動，否則將再沒有機會；然而陽葵表示程式尚不穩定，強行啟動可能導致全員喪命。另一邊，美食研究會和遊戲開發部抵達控制室，阿拜多斯也將支援老師戰鬥。
desc.jp: 集中的能量造成了方舟各地區的緊急情況。優香斷定自爆程式必須啟動，否則將再沒有機會；然而陽葵表示程式尚不穩定，強行啟動可能導致全員喪命。另一邊，美食研究會和遊戲開發部抵達控制室，阿拜多斯也將支援老師戰鬥。
desc.zh_cn: 集中的能量造成了方舟各地区的紧急情况。{cf优香}断定自爆程序必须启动，否则将再没有机会；然而{cf阳葵}表示程序尚不稳定，强行启动可能导致全员丧命。另一边，{cn美食研究会}和{cn游戏开发部}抵达控制室，{sn阿拜多斯}也将支持老师战斗。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

hobby.zh_cn_jp: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物

desc.en: 在決定按下之前，琳向莉音詢問逃脫程式的原理，後者則表示其是能利用方舟的計算使人躍遷到地面上的裝置，並已根據人數設定為共能使用23人次——除了必須在爆炸前儘快轉移。
desc.jp: 在決定按下之前，琳向莉音詢問逃脫程式的原理，後者則表示其是能利用方舟的計算使人躍遷到地面上的裝置，並已根據人數設定為共能使用23人次——除了必須在爆炸前儘快轉移。
desc.zh_cn: 在决定按下之前，{cf琳}向{cf莉音}询问逃脱程序的原理，后者则表示其是能利用方舟的计算使人跃迁到地面上的装置，并已根据人数设定为共能使用23人次——除了必须在爆炸前尽快转移。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 琳下令啟動方舟自爆程式，並開始轉移人員。莉音指出爆炸將可能波及生命守護者號，使其最後一起爆炸。亞子在爆炸中被瓦片擊中，佳世子及時救出。
desc.jp: 琳下令啟動方舟自爆程式，並開始轉移人員。莉音指出爆炸將可能波及生命守護者號，使其最後一起爆炸。亞子在爆炸中被瓦片擊中，佳世子及時救出。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}下令启动方舟自爆程序，并开始转移人员。{cf莉音}指出爆炸将可能波及生命守护者号，使其最后一起爆炸。{cf亚子}在爆炸中被瓦片击中，{cf佳世子}及时救出。

desc.en: 根據安排，亞子、佳世子先行撤離，琳則表示要儘可能協助老師，因而自己將最後撤離。桃香、步隨後撤離。在走之前，陽葵向琳表示，自己已經將“光之劍”——也就是愛麗絲所製造的方舟，與生命守護者號相連線，以備不時之需。陽葵、花子之後撤離。優香在將遊戲開發部託付給綾音之後撤離。最後，綾音和琳共同支援老師。
desc.jp: 根據安排，亞子、佳世子先行撤離，琳則表示要儘可能協助老師，因而自己將最後撤離。桃香、步隨後撤離。在走之前，陽葵向琳表示，自己已經將“光之劍”——也就是愛麗絲所製造的方舟，與生命守護者號相連線，以備不時之需。陽葵、花子之後撤離。優香在將遊戲開發部託付給綾音之後撤離。最後，綾音和琳共同支援老師。
desc.zh_cn: 根据安排，{cf亚子}、{cf佳世子}先行撤离，{cf琳}则表示要尽可能协助老师，因而自己将最后撤离。{cf桃香}、{cf步}随后撤离。在走之前，{cf阳葵}向{cf琳}表示，自己已经将“光之剑”——也就是{cf爱丽丝}所制造的方舟，与生命守护者号相连接，以备不时之需。{cf阳葵}、{cf花子}之后撤离。{cf优香}在将{cn游戏开发部}托付给{cf绫音}之后撤离。最后，{cf绫音}和{cf琳}共同支援老师。

desc.en: It's time for the final battle against Phrenapates. To defeat the enemy and escape the Ark, everyone must join forces. And the truth that will be revealed at the end of it all is...
desc.jp: It's time for the final battle against Phrenapates. To defeat the enemy and escape the Ark, everyone must join forces. And the truth that will be revealed at the end of it all is...
desc.zh_cn: 结束「阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战」后，老师顺利与{cf白子}会合。接着只剩下回到地面了──然而并非如此。在老师的面前，展现不同姿态的{cf白子}与色彩的向导者出现了。究竟，他们能否平安回到地上呢？

desc.en: It's time for the final battle against Phrenapates. To defeat the enemy and escape the Ark, everyone must join forces. And the truth that will be revealed at the end of it all is...
desc.jp: It's time for the final battle against Phrenapates. To defeat the enemy and escape the Ark, everyone must join forces. And the truth that will be revealed at the end of it all is...
desc.zh_cn: 结束「阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战」后，老师顺利与{cf白子}会合。接着只剩下回到地面了──然而并非如此。在老师的面前，展现不同姿态的{cf白子}与色彩的向导者出现了。究竟，他们能否平安回到地上呢？

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
